name: Decontamination (KenForest)
description:
The game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50 on the theme of "Delay the inevitable"

Decontamination is a game where you work in a decontamination organization. You travel to different zones and clear them of infection. In these zones, you will need to complete tasks such as cleaning up toxic lakes, collecting minerals, or even saving the creatures in these places.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Shift - Run

LBM - Interact

Mouse scroll - change items

F - Flashlight

Tab - Task menu

Esc - pause menu
